title: O nama
aboutOne: Established in 2023. Dvorište Hostel is the perfect place to call home during your work stay. Situated at Andrije Marića 11, Majur, 2.8 km from the Šabac city centre and 1.5 km from the industrial zone, our hostel offers a unique experience for your workers.
aboutTwo: At Dvorište Hostel, we understand that comfort, convenience, and affordable prices are key factors when choosing accommodation. Step through our doors and discover a world of comfort. Our well-appointed rooms are tastefully decorated and equipped with modern amenities that guarantee a peaceful sleep.
aboutThree: The rooms are double and triple occupancy, with a Hostel capacity of 18-20 beds. They are equipped with Wi-Fi, cable TV, heating, and air conditioning. We also provide free parking.
